Welcome to "Private Contacts".

The goal of this app is to allow you to store contacts which you do not want to share with the other apps on your device.

For now, that is all the app does: A clone of the normal contacts app which does not share any contacts you create.

In the future, additional functionality will be added to also manage your "normal" contacts in this app and declare for each contact separately whether it should be shared with other apps or not.
